markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Elysian Titan](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1339)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Those titans who remained true to their creators, refusing to participate in their peers' rebellion, earned their freedom while the others were imprisoned. Many Elysian titans train aspiring champions of freedom, sacrifice, and selflessness.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 47

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 45

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 42
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Titan_ElysianTitan.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 21">[Elysian Titan](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1339)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Gargantuan" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Titan" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=316" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 268, [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 82</row>

**Perception** +36; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +36, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +43, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +37, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +37, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +35, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +37, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +37

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +10

**Dex** +7

**Con** +8

**Int** +6

**Wis** +8

**Cha** +6
</row>

**Items**
_+2 [greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)_, _+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [greatpick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=23)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 46 

**Fort** +37 

**Ref** +34 

**Will** +35 

+4 status to all saves vs. [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)
</row>

**HP** 400

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)

**Impossible Stature** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 100 feet. Titans warp perception and distance around them to seem even larger and more imposing. A creature that enters or begins its turn within the emanation must succeed at a DC 44 Will save or its movement toward the titan is movement over difficult terrain (greater difficult terrain on a critical failure) for 1 round.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet; [_air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_greatpick_ +41 ([fatal d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 4d10+20 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +38 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 4d8+20 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rock +38 ([Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 200 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 3d12+20 bludgeoning

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 44
- **5th**
[Sending](/Spells.aspx?ID=272) (×3)
- **6th**
[Scrying](/Spells.aspx?ID=268) (×3)
- **7th**
[Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (at will)
- **8th**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (at will), [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128) (at will)
- **10th**
[Meteor Swarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=191), [Revival](/Spells.aspx?ID=262)
- **Constant (10th)**
[Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6), [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)

**Divine Rituals** DC 44

- **8th**
[Freedom](/Rituals.aspx?ID=11)

**[Throw Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=38)** <actions string="Single Action" />  

**Titanic Grasp** <actions string="Single Action" />  The titan makes a fist Strike against a creature affected by their Impossible Stature, even if it's outside of the titan's normal reach. On a hit, the titan automatically [Grabs](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) the creature and, if out of their reach, pulls it within reach.

**Wide Cleave** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The titan makes a melee weapon Strike against each foe within their reach. This counts as three attacks for the titan's multiple attack penalty.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-205" />
name: Elysian Titan
